importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The federal government shutdown was ongoing as of this date, impacting federal operations and public services.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The shutdown began around this time, affecting federal workers and services across the United States.

keyTakeAways: Federal workers are being laid off in large numbers due to the shutdown.
Local businesses, including those in Washington, DC and outside national parks, are struggling to hire employees.
Federally-backed housing loans have been halted, preventing people from moving into new homes.
The shutdown directly affects personal finances through loss of income and business operations.
The financial ripple effects of the shutdown extend beyond politics to everyday individuals' wallets.

namedEntities.name: federal government
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The central governing body of the United States
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The shutdown of the federal government is the central event discussed in the article, disrupting services and operations nationwide.

namedEntities.name: federal workers
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Public employees working for federal agencies
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: They are being laid off in thousands, directly impacting employment and household income.

namedEntities.name: local businesses
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Small or regional businesses operating in communities
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: They are struggling to hire staff, affecting their ability to remain operational.

namedEntities.name: Washington, DC
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The capital city of the United States
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: It is explicitly mentioned as a location where local businesses are affected by the shutdown.

namedEntities.name: national parks
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Publicly protected areas managed by federal agencies
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: Businesses outside national parks are affected, indicating a broader regional economic impact.

namedEntities.name: federally-backed housing loans
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Loans supported by federal government programs
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: These loans are halted, preventing individuals from moving into new homes and disrupting real estate transactions.

namedEntities.name: Ramishah Maruf
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: She is the author responsible for reporting on the financial impacts of the shutdown on American citizens.

namedEntities.name: CNN
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: It is the source of the article, providing public awareness and media coverage of the financial consequences of the shutdown.

summaryOfNewsArticle: The federal government shutdown has led to widespread financial hardship for Americans, including mass layoffs of federal workers, difficulty for local businesses to hire employees, and a halt in federally-backed housing loans, all of which impact individuals' personal finances and economic stability.
title: How has the federal government shutdown affected your wallet?
